me.normanmaurer.niosmtp.transport

Interface SMTPClientSession

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSMTPClientSession, NettyLMTPClientSession

    public interface SMTPClientSession
    This is the SMTP Session which belongs to a Connection to a SMTP Server. It's created once a connection was successfully established and valid till its closed via close() or an Exception
    Author:
    Norman Maurer

    • Method Detail

      • getDeliveryMode

        SMTPDeliveryMode getDeliveryMode()
        Return the SMTPDeliveryMode which is used for the underlying transport
        Returns:
        mode

      • setAttribute

        Object setAttribute(String key,
                  Object value)
        Allow to store a object to the SMTPClientSession with the given key. To remove a previous stored object just use a null value with the given key.
        Parameters:
        key - the key under which the given value should be stored
        value - the value which should be stored under the given key or null if the previous stored value should just be removed
        Returns:
        storedValue the previous stored value or null if no value was stored before with the key

      • getAttribute

        Object getAttribute(String key)
        Return the value which was stored under the key
        Parameters:
        key - the key for which the value should be returned
        Returns:
        value the value for the given key or null if no value is stored under the given key

      • getSupportedExtensions

        Set<String> getSupportedExtensions()
        Return a "read-only" Set of all supported EXTENSIONS. This will be set in the EHLO Response so you will get an empty Set before the EHLO Response was processed
        Returns:
        extensions

      • addSupportedExtensions

        void addSupportedExtensions(String extension)
        Add the supported EXTENSIONS for the SMTPClientSession.
        Parameters:
        extension -

      • getRemoteAddress

        InetSocketAddress getRemoteAddress()
        Return the remote InetSocketAddress which the SMTPClientSession is bound to. If the SMTPClientSession is not yet bound this may return null
        Returns:
        remoteAddress
